snippet.title: Fortress of The Witch King for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

Commodore 64


Game description:

Fortress of the Witch King is a turn-based RPG for 1-4 players.
You move over the map and after your move poits are expired, it's the turn of the other player.

On the map, you might encounter a group of a certain enemy type, like werebears or hobgoblins. Then you and your warriors fight and try to win the battle. However, some enemies like elves, warriors or dwarves might join you.

They have abilities your warriors (which with you start) don't have, for example elves can shoot fireballs.

You can also buy new troops in towns.


What I think:

Nice game, but if it wouldn't feel so repetitive, it would have gotten a higher rating.
